alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties; Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:05AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations 2 to 5 inches western Uinta Basin, 2 to 6 inches Sanpete and Sevier Valleys, 5 to 10 inches western Millard and Juab Counties, 6 to 12 eastern Millard and Juab Counties and southwest Utah. Gusty winds up to 60 mph across western Utah will gradually decrease overnight. * WHERE...Western Uinta Basin, Western Millard and Juab Counties, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Sanpete Valley, Sevier Valley and Southwest Utah. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction laws may be enacted. Heavy snow may impact the Wednesday morning commute. Blowing and drifting snow may reduce visibility through the overnight hours.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
